ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm....one from the dark elves?  You must mean getting one somewhere like Najena...there is a dark elf npc (Najena) in there that has quite a nice robe.. or
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm....one from the dark elves? You must mean getting one somewhere like
Najena...there is a dark elf npc (Najena) in there that has quite a nice
robe.. or you could go to Befallen and bonk the one down in third level as
well...you can invis and run through Nek forest to lavastorm to go to
Najena and/or just go to befallen in east commons...otherwise I don't know
what you mean off a player or what... I don't think there are many who have
robes they want to give up...most of us earn them :)



At 1301 7/19/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: pulsar@...
>
>Hi all!
>I'm a High elf wizard and would like to have a nice robe. I was
>thinking of one from the dark elves.. hehe.. That should upset them.
>
>How does one get a robe from them? I'm KOS i suppose. Robes are NO DROP
>to.. Someone fetch one and then /consent? Does this really work?
>
